message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $95.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $95 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay right now.  I'm interested in the product, but I'd be happy to pay $90 for it.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $92.50.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price.  $92.50 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with.  How about $91?  That would be a fair price for both of us.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I can see you're really interested in the product. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $92.
